description: Towards Achieving at Least 30% Partcipation of Women at Decision Making Levels in Malaysia

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Plan of Action to ensure at least 30 percent participation of women at decision-making levels in Malaysia. The Plan of Action sets out the recommendations, policies, measures and actions to be taken in order to arrive at the objective of fast tracking at least 30% women into decision-making positions in Malaysia.  The project covers the legislative, executive and judiciary as the components of government, political parties and the corporate sector. It identifies the implementors and deliverables of the recommendations as well as setting out the timelines for implementation.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: SEDC: 30% Women Decision

title: SEDC: 30% Women at Decision Making Levels
